name: PINK - Second Amendment Supporter Wristband
description:
We don't want the ladies to feel left out!  These wristbands have pink embossing and are a bit smaller than our standard Second Amendment Supporter wristband.

"A well regulated militia, being necessary to the security of a free state, the right of the people to keep and bear arms shall not be infringed."

- Second Amendment to the U.S. Constitution

$2.00 from each wristband sale goes toward the Sandy Hook School Support Fund. More information can be found here:
https://newtown.uwwesternct.org
